name: in-search-of-happiness
description: A site that helps junior devs generate ideas for their first job

scripts.setup-db: concurrently "brew install mongodb" "brew tap homebrew/services" "brew services run mongodb" "node createLocalTestDb.js"
scripts.test-frontend: concurrently "cd react-ui/webdriverio-test && java -jar -Dwebdriver.gecko.driver=./geckodriver selenium-server-standalone-3.4.0.jar" "cd react-ui && ./node_modules/.bin/wdio wdio.conf.js"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd react-ui/ && npm install --only=dev && npm install && npm run build
